item.title: [ATL][Backbone] - Equipment maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 6, 23:30 UTC  -  Nov 7, 01:30 UTC

Oct 7, 02:28 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our backbone infrastructure.

Start time : 06/11/2025 23:30 UTC
End time : 07/11/2025 01:30 UTC
Service impact : During maintenance, the network will be temporarily unavailable for the localzone.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment to improve general performance.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [LIM3][Cooling System] - Rack LIM0305A04C maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 4, 05:00 - 15:00 UTC

Oct 6, 12:24 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure.

Start time : 04/11/2025 05:00 UTC
End time : 04/11/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance, the cooling system's efficiency may be temporarily reduced for some servers, potentially lowering performance. Despite ongoing mitigation efforts, customers could still experience a temporary reboot or shutdown in the worst case.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.
